body:
Comment 4 by **seanerussell**: 
This would still be useful functionality.

Suffixes *are* relevant, even for tempfiles.  The ServeFile is just one example, and the
ticket shouldn't be discounted just because there's a work-around.  There are other,
third-party, libraries which also rely on the suffix, and third-party applications which
rely on the suffix, none of which are easily modifiable by developers.
